item.description:
Hike Ascutney Mountain in the morning and attend Octoberfest at the Harpoon Brewery in Windsor, Vermont. (opptional)  In addition there is a chicken dancing contest for all interested hikers.

UPDATE: Let's all meet at the Exit 8 park and ride. Weathersfield trail is a short drive from there. Driving south, turn right at the end of the exit ramp and the park and ride is immediately to your left. Before the fire station and across from Canon tire. Please be on time and let me know your coming so that have accurate count. See you there!!!

 http://www.harpoonbrewery.com/index.cfm?pid=28570

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Hike Ascutney Moutain/ Harpoon Brewery Octoberfest
